import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Profile() { const [buyer_name, setbuyer_name] = useState(""); const [buyer_email, setbuyer_email] = useState(""); const [phone1, setphone1] = useState(""); const [password, setpassword] = useState(""); const [buyer_address, setbuyer_address] = useState(""); const [seller_name, setseller_name] = useState(""); const [seller_email, setseller_email] = useState(""); // const [phone1, setphone1] = useState("");0 // const [password, setpassword] = useState(""); const [seller_address, setseller_address] = useState(""); const [id, setId] = useState(sessionStorage.getItem("user")); const [role_id, setRole_Id] = useState(sessionStorage.getItem("role")); const [formErros, setFormErrros] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { fatchUserName(); console.log(id); }, [id]); const fatchUserName = async () => { if (role_id == 1) { try { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:1122/rfa/buyers/" + id); console.log(res.data); setbuyer_name(res.data.buyer_name); setbuyer_email(res.data.buyer_email); setphone1(res.data.phone1); setpassword(res.data.password); setbuyer_address(res.data.buyer_address); } catch (error) {} } else if (role_id == 2) { try { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:1122/rfa/sellers/" + id); console.log(res.data); setseller_name(res.data.seller_name); setseller_email(res.data.seller_email); setphone1(res.data.phone1); setpassword(res.data.password); setseller_address(res.data.seller_address); } catch (error) {} } }; const submitbtn = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (role_id == 1) { try { const data = { buyer_name, buyer_email, phone1, password, buyer_address, }; let res = ""; if (id) { res = await axios.put("http://localhost:1122/rfa/buyers/" + id, data); } alert(res.data); console.log(res.data); window.location.reload(); } catch (error) {} } else if (role_id == 2) { try { const data = { seller_name, seller_email, phone1, password, seller_address, }; let res = ""; if (id) { res = await axios.put( "http://localhost:1122/rfa/sellers/" + id, data ); } alert(res.data); window.location.reload(); } catch (error) {} } }; return (
